name: Theme Jeweled
description:
Theme Jeweled is a free game based on popular match-3 titles.

Features:
Two levels with distinct themes and theme-based powerups

  • Haunted Cabin
  • Enchanted Forest

Two gamemodes

  • Classic (until you run out of moves)
  • Lightning (time-based)

Online leaderboards / Highscores
Compare your matching skills to that of others in real-time!

Please note that this game requires a decent PC / Laptop to run!

For development builds and progress, consider visiting my Patreon!
